text: Random question: is there a reason an RSS Feed Module would not update a featured image from a published blog that changed their featured image?
Hi <@U25C6PU56>, we cache rss feeds for an hour so loading times aren't ridiculous.

Thanks <@U6GNQ7JBU>. That may be it, but I’m seeing cases where it won’t update for hours or even days. The Design Manager as a whole seems to be lagging for me a lot in representing changes lately. Not sure if anyone else is experiencing that. Just been noticing it lately in several portals.
Can you DM an example page where you aren't seeing the updated RSS feeds for >1 hour? I can take a look

When the featured image was updated, was the image simply overwritten with a different image with the same name? I know I have had issues in the past with images that are replaced in the File Manager not updating to the new image right away. I usually end up renaming the image locally and adding it as a "new" upload
Thanks for the input <@U2H3TT8F2>, but that was not the issue. We weren’t replacing anything or using similar names. We got it sorted it for now thanks to <@U6GNQ7JBU>!
